channel.title: Converting 562 loading 602 to load 657
channel.description:
So I'm working on converting my 562 loading 602 server to a 562 loading 657.
I have put the equipment and the mapdata in and everything looks good,
[s]but when I try to use the item command for say... 20135-Torva full helm. I get malformed command error.[/s] [s] Now, I know that in order to get the equip.txt to work I had to edit the array to allow more items. I'm wondering is there a function that controls the amount of items or max item number for commands? Also am I missing something to make the new items work?[/s]
[s]I have fixed the malformed error by editing the array in the itemdefinitions.java, now I still get toolkits. What more do I need to add to the server to get the new items to work correctly?[/s]
Adding the items in the itemdefinitions.xml fixed the issue. Now the final thing, the flashing HP icon. Should be a simple fix. Where I go my client it basically says add sendConfig(5000,hitpoints) packet. Literally that. Do I add this to the action sender somewhere or the action button packet sender or what. He did a terrible job of explaining this.

item.title: Converting 562 loading 602 to load 657
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

So I’m working on converting my 562 loading 602 server to a 562 loading 657.

I have put the equipment and the mapdata in and everything looks good,

but when I try to use the item command for say… 20135-Torva full helm. I get malformed command error.

Now, I know that in order to get the equip.txt to work I had to edit the array to allow more items. I’m wondering is there a function that controls the amount of items or max item number for commands? Also am I missing something to make the new items work?

I have fixed the malformed error by editing the array in the itemdefinitions.java, now I still get toolkits. What more do I need to add to the server to get the new items to work correctly?

Adding the items in the itemdefinitions.xml fixed the issue. Now the final thing, the flashing HP icon. Should be a simple fix. Where I go my client it basically says add sendConfig(5000,hitpoints) packet. Literally that. Do I add this to the action sender somewhere or the action button packet sender or what. He did a terrible job of explaining this.

Read full topic
